Summary: The price is very good. They offer basic rooms,with multiple different room layouts(kitchenettes,disabled,family room,etc). All rooms were clean,and I always feel safe when visiting. The location is great because Disneyland is only 2 or 3 miles,Knott's Berry Farm about 4/5 miles away and your across the street from all types of restaurants,movie theater,Costco and night clubs,bars and sushi restaurant. The train station is only 1 mile away along with the old spaghetti factory. Definitely recommend staying here. The only thing that would make it better is breakfast.
Room tip: Rooms in the second building are larger-king size beds. There's no elevator for the 2nd floor...

Summary Heading: Filthy rooms and they opened our suitcases. Stay away!
Summary: This is going to be a long review but this place shouldn’t even be on business... It was a NIGHTMARE from beginning to end. We booked through booking.com since was a close location to go to Disneyland. After a very long trip all we wanted was a shower and a good sleep. We didn’t get either. The room was filthy, old and with a bad stale odour. As soon as I stepped in the shower I saw beard hair on the walls. I just closed my eyes and had a quick shower.. I reached the towels and not even one of them was clean! Stinky and full of stains.. I tried at least to use the hairdryer and guess what?! It was broken! At this point I just wanted to scream and I went to bed. The pillows were yellow.. I had to use one of my t-shirts to cover it. The next day after washing our faces with COLD

Arrived with a reservation from expedia. Manager said he had not received it, and refused to let me check in even though I could show the reservation. He said I should come back at 6 o'clock and see if they had received the reservation by then. I said I was not willing to wait that long and he told me to cancel the reservation the. When I asked to use the internet to do the cancellation he said their internet was down, and that was of course the actual reason he hadn't received the reservation. I canceled and stayed elsewhere.

Summary Heading: Bad service. Charged more than it should be + throw out our gear!!!!!
Summary: Very bad experience. We stayed three nights and the fourth night we were out until 2pm. They damp our gear( luggage, suitcases out of the room) We lost phone and charger etc.. The hotel never admit there are phones and charges etc...  What's more, they changed one more day on a different credit card.   Warning, make sure you never provide your credit cards information to them....

Summary Heading: REFUSED to let my family stay here
Summary: My daughter was stranded in Southern California. I called this hotel to get her a room for the night. He hung up on me several times worst customer service ever. I would never stay here or let my family!!!!

Such great people, my boyfriend and I always go. Super clean and surrounded by many restaurants and great places to visit. Disneyland is about 10 minutes away by car. I recommend this hotel 100 percent

Summary Heading: Do not stay here! Worst customer service!
Summary: Do not stay here!!!! Absolute worst customer service I have ever encountered in my life! When I first checked in the man at the front desk interrogated me with questions asking me if I had any extra people staying with me even though I paid for 2 bedrooms.  Then he repeatedly asked me where I was going and why I needed 2 beds and had me promise him that I was not going to bring any extra people to the room. He had no business asking me a bunch of personal questions about my stay and definitely not the best way to greet someone. I went out and got back to the room and brought a friend with me. As I walked through the door the phone rang not even a minute later. I picked up and the man told me that since I brought someone back to the room I needed to pay extra money. I said "ok

I spent two nights here and was very happy with the place.  It is a motel in Fullerton, with good access to shops and restaurants. There is a diner and Starbucks almost next door, and other food outlets, and shops such as Walmart and a coin laundry nearby.   It was about a 15 minute walk from Fullerton Metrolink station, although I think there is a bus route along here too. Being a motel parking was not an issue.  It provided free wifi in a large room equipped with a King sized bed, small sofa and coffee table. The bathroom was ok, without being anything special.  I thought that this was very good value compared to some of the other places in the region I had stopped on the same trip.

We found all the reviews on the Willow Tree from great to a dump, but it was near to an event we were attending, so we took a chance. We found it to be very acceptable. the area didn't seem threatening, had several paces to eat within walking distance, the room was clean and reasonable. We especially like motor lodge style rooms, we travel via 2 wheels, so having our moto right out front is important to us

good deal nice area conviently located next to walmart resturants movie theatre close to freeway and the basics shopping needs i really like the area because the commute on the city busses are frequent

I'm not sure why people have rated this place so high. I was disappointed. The location is close to theme parks however, there are a lot of homeless milling around. Lots of restaurants within walking distance but I wouldn't go out at night alone. We had a shabby room with a 3 inch cockroach in it. We checked out within an hour after Mr. Roach made his appearance. The owners were surprised as it was their best room (121) and offered us another. We declined and wanted a refund. Alittle hesitant about refunding until we showed them the video of Mr. Roach climbing up the bathroom wall.

Budget friendly hotel close to Disneyland.  If you are on a budget and need a place to stay close to Disneyland check out this no frills budget motel.  The price was right.  I don't ask for a lot. I just wanted to stay somewhere that was clean and didn't have bugs.  This fulfilled both of those needs. When I say no frills that is exactly what I mean.  There is no coffee maker, hair dryer or even alarm clock in the room.  You will be provided with soap, cups and an ice bucket.  The rooms do have fridges and microwaves so this was a plus.  Never had any issue with the Wi-Fi.  Had a good strong signal all the time and I was at one of the furthest points away from the office. Worth a look if you need a good and inexpensive place to stay

It is hard to find a motel this close to Disneyland & shopping that is less than $100.00 per night. Our rate actually was less than $75.00 with the offered discounts so very pleased. Yes the facility is old and a bit retro, but our room with king size bed, & flat screen TV was very clean and smelled freshly painted. Staff was friendly and gave us a room substantially away from Harbor blvd & street noise that provided a quiet night of rest. Good value.

Summary Heading: u need to check this place out its clean cheap good parking and quiet
Summary: was clean great parking lots  of places to eat close by and shopping love  it goin to cali next month and goin to stay here again managment very frendly they have smoke free rooms and microwave and mini fridge cable its good for the price

This place is disgusting & should be inspected by the city. The restroom room was not clean. The refrigerator was gross with warm stagnate water. One of the chairs had a stain that looked very disgusting. The front-desk was very rude.
